snippet: The Pittsburgh Penguins placed their star center Sidney Crosby on the injured list Monday, meaning he will have to miss at least the first week of the season.
lead_paragraph: The Pittsburgh Penguins placed their star center Sidney Crosby on the injured list Monday, meaning he will have to miss at least the first week of the season.

headline.main: Crosby to Miss Start of Season
headline.print_headline: Crosby to Miss Start of Season
